entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
